description: React component 'NotesView' for displaying notes in grid or list format with search and filter functionalities. Uses custom hook 'useNotes' for note management and renders 'NoteCard' components.

methods.name: NotesView({ view = 'grid', filters = {}, onEdit })
methods.description: React functional component that displays notes either in grid or list view with filtering and editing capabilities.
